pageProduct.name: White Glo Coconut Oil Pulling Sachets 10 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

White Glo Coconut Oil Pulling Deep Cleansing Oil Pulling Treatment assists to draw out stains, detoxify whole mouth and prevent bad breath.

What is Coconut Oil Pulling?


Coconut oil pulling is an age-old holistic oral care routine. This Ayurvedic practice uses Coconut Oil to clean and detoxify teeth and gums to improve oral health. It can also whiten teeth naturally and be beneficial for gum health.


Benefits for oral health may include:


- Whiter teeth. 


- Cavity and gingivitis Reduction.


- Better breath. 


- Healthier teeth and gums.

Size: 10 x 10mL

Ingredients

Natural Coconut Oil (Cocos Nucifera (coconut) Oil), Baking Soda (Sodium Bicarbonate), Mint (Mentha Piperita (Peppermint).

Directions

Put Coconut Oil into mouth. Swish for 2 minutes. Rinse mouth with warm water. Hello sparkling smile!
